## Checklist

- [ ] No secrets, credentials, or API keys in code/configs/logs
- [ ] Tests added or updated

- [ ] If adding/changing a capability: receipts + policy + outcome events verified
- [ ] If changing policy logic: PolicyDecision records updated
- [ ] Docs updated (if applicable)
